name: Sticky Fingers
description:
Sticky Fingers is a stealth 3D platformer, where you play as the most famous art thief in the world. You have your eyes set on the Googhien's newest exhibit of modern art. Armed with your two trusty sticky hand guns you aim to leave your mark by stealing as much art as you possibly can. Remember to be stealthy, be sneaky, and of course be sticky.

To play this game you will need a controller. It was coded for a ps4 controller, but if you rebind the buttons you should be able to use another type.
